With an advanced level of English, I thrive in both collaborative and independent environments, solving complex problems with efficiency and creativity. Through professional experience and personal projects, Iâ€™ve honed my skills in HTML, CSS and programming languages such as Javascript, Typescript, and Python. About.description2: I am constantly expanding my knowledge of UI/UX design principles, responsive web design, and performance optimization. I value writing clean, maintainable code and delivering intuitive user experiences. My background in engineering has also equipped me with a unique perspective on problem-solving, which I apply to every challenge in web development.
